name: Panta Rhei [WIP]
description:
Have your god ever been so busy that they ask you to change religions? Have they? That's weird, because that same thing happens to our protagonist in this adventure through Hades' realm!

Our Twitters!

@aliheyoli - Art Director, Art Writter, Art Everything and Writing.

@Nekuness - Coding, writing and Cerberus.

(ALSO IT HAS A DUCK, TRY TO FIND IT!!!)

[This is a WIP. We're very sleepy and out of time, our programmer had to draw 4 panels, let's see if you can find them! We'll take a long, long nap, and then patch this bad boy up with some fixing and we will add some sound effects. None of the art is final, they are all sketches. We hope to polish this game with some nice art and improvements. Hope you like it :D]
